name: Windows 98 Design System
description:
Windows 98 Design System in Figma


â†’ Share a link to this file: https://figma.fun/gmcA1r


The design system is not complete but a good start with some buttons in different states, checkboxes, radio and slider controls, icons, cursors, and of course gorgeous window frames. This kit is enough to create graphics with old Windows 98 aesthetics in Figma easily.


Contributions welcome!

It's pretty easy to expand too, so if you want to contribute, I'm more than happy to accept and add components you create to this kit. Let me know! Ways to contact me can be found at my site https://gleb.sexy


Disclaimer: This is not an official resource and it's not affiliated with Microsoft.
